DOC.brief_summary: After informed consent , participant ask complete medical/family history questionnaire provide blood sample . Some participant may also ask provide urine sample . Individuals undergoing procedure require collection biological sample clinical purpose may sample save research purpose . Participants also ask permission study investigator access medical record and/or recontact update medical family history . Data biospecimens store potential future research project .
